name: ClimbingWeather.com
summary: The ClimbingWeather.com API provides a REST/JSON interface to ClimbingWeather.coms area and forecast data. The ClimbingWeather.com API is intended for website and mobile developers who want to integrate ClimbingWeather.com data into their applications.
details: The ClimbingWeather.com API provides a REST/JSON interface to ClimbingWeather.coms area and forecast data. The ClimbingWeather.com API is intended for website and mobile developers who want to integrate ClimbingWeather.com data into their applications.

name: HOBO Data Loggers
summary: The HOBOlinku0026reg; Web Services API is an application programming interface that enables organizations to easily integrate energy and environmental data from Onset HOBOlink web servers with custom software applications. It will be utilized by a range of users, from building energy dashboard suppliers to developers looking to embed real-time weather data from Onset HOBOu0026reg; U30 monitoring systems i
details: The HOBOlinku0026reg; Web Services API is an application programming interface that enables organizations to easily integrate energy and environmental data from Onset HOBOlink web servers with custom software applications. It will be utilized by a range of users, from building energy dashboard suppliers to developers looking to embed real-time weather data from Onset HOBOu0026reg; U30 monitoring systems into web-based portals.

name: National Weather Service
summary: The National Weather Service (NWS), once known as the Weather Bureau,[2] is a part of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) of the United States government. It is headquartered in Silver Spring, Maryland. The NWS is tasked with providing forecasts, public warnings, and other products to organizations and the public for the purposes of protection, safety, and general informatio
details: The National Weather Service (NWS), once known as the Weather Bureau,[2] is a part of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) of the United States government. It is headquartered in Silver Spring, Maryland. The NWS is tasked with providing forecasts, public warnings, and other products to organizations and the public for the purposes of protection, safety, and general information. This is done through a collection of national and regional centers, and 122 local weather forecast offices (WFOs). As the NWS is a government agency, most of its products are in the public domain and available free of charge.

name: OpenWeatherMap
summary: Get current weather, daily forecast for 16 days, and 3-hourly forecast 5 days for your city. Helpful stats, graphics, and this day in history charts are available for your reference. Interactive maps show precipitation, clouds, pressure, wind around your location. Simple and fast APIs. Access to current weather, forecasts, maps and historical data in JSON, XML, and HTML formats. A variety of map l
details: Get current weather, daily forecast for 16 days, and 3-hourly forecast 5 days for your city. Helpful stats, graphics, and this day in history charts are available for your reference. Interactive maps show precipitation, clouds, pressure, wind around your location. Simple and fast APIs. Access to current weather, forecasts, maps and historical data in JSON, XML, and HTML formats. A variety of map layers are available including precipitation, clouds, pressure, temperature, wind, and many more.

name: Weather2020
summary: Weather2020 is the first and only source capable of producing accurate, long-range forecasts for businesses and consumers. Our robust weather API allows you to integrate our forecasts and videos easily into your mobile apps and websites.
details: Weather2020 is the first and only source capable of producing accurate, long-range forecasts for businesses and consumers. Our robust weather API allows you to integrate our forecasts and videos easily into your mobile apps and websites.

name: Wunderground API

details: Weather Underground is committed to delivering the most reliable, accurate weather information possible.  Wunderground.comu2019s  state-of-the-art technology monitors conditions and forecasts for locations across the world, so youu2019ll always find the weather information that you need.  In addition to providing free, real-time online weather information to millions of Web users around the world, Weather Underground also streams live weather data to thousands of news and media outlets around the world.

name: Yahoo
summary: Get up-to-date weather information for any location, including 5-day forecast, wind, atmosphere, astronomy conditions, and more. You can lookup weather by woeid, city name or lat/long.
details: Get up-to-date weather information for any location, including 5-day forecast, wind, atmosphere, astronomy conditions, and more. You can lookup weather by woeid, city name or lat/long.
